name: Octorand3DVisualizer
description:
It contains all original Primes with their respective traits. These are generated procedurally from the data in the blockchain, so they should be as up to date as possible.

Users can navigate the scene with keyboard and mouse:

  •  Move - WASD
  • Turn - Right-Click and move the mouse

Users can do some minor customization of both the camera and the simulation:

  • Press 'H' to show the config UI.
  • Sort the Primes by Name, Score or just let them move around by selecting Free Form.
  • Find a prime by providing its Asset ID. After pressing Enter, the camera will snap to it.
  • Configure the camera to your preferences: Movement speed, turn rate.
  • Tip: Reduce view distance to improve performance.

Feedback:

Would love to hear from you, so please leave all suggestions, feedback and ideas in the comments!
